name: CODING_COMMENTS
description: This table contains information about coding comments on hospital accounts.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with a coding comment. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with coding comments for this account.

columns.name: CODING_COMMENT
columns.description: User-entered general purpose comments regarding the coding of the account.
